articles.description: England did just enough to scrape past the Netherlands in a must-win encounter at Wembley Stadium - but Sarina Wiegman's side are still being punished for costly mistakes.
articles.title: 'England get job done but mistakes could prove costly'

articles.description: Kevin Durant's seventh 30-point game in a row lifts him to 10th on the NBA's all-time scoring list.
articles.title: Suns' Durant moves into all-time scoring top 10

articles.description: Bangladesh record a first home Test victory over New Zealand thanks to Taijul Islam's 10-wicket match haul.
articles.title: Taijul claims 10 wickets as Bangladesh make history

articles.description: Ruben Neves says he "wants to stay" at Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal and will not go on loan to Newcastle United.
articles.title: Al-Hilal's Neves says he will not join Newcastle

articles.description: Scotland will be relegated to Women's Nations League B despite Erin Cuthbert's stunning equaliser against Belgium.
articles.title: Scotland relegated to Nations League B after draw

articles.description: Wales are relegated from the top tier of the Nations League as they are beaten 2-1 by Iceland in Cardiff.
articles.title: Wales relegated from Nations League top tier

articles.description: Eight Scottish Professional Football League games are postponed, including Livingston v Ross County in the Premiership, as freezing temperatures threaten more of Saturday's programme.
articles.title: Eight matches off and inspections planned in SPFL

articles.description: Ronnie O'Sullivan keeps his hopes of a record-extending eighth UK Championship crown alive with a courageous 6-5 comeback victory against Zhou Yuelong in York.
articles.title: O'Sullivan survives Zhou scare to reach UK semis

articles.description: Williams confirm American Logan Sargeant will remain with the team next season, completing the 20-driver grid for 2024.
articles.title: Williams retain Sargeant to complete 2024 F1 grid

articles.description: India beat a much-changed Australia by 20 runs to complete a T20 series victory in Raipur.
articles.title: India beat Australia to seal T20 series win
